Name: Brutal Dinosaur
About the game: Brutal Dinosaur is a game that mixes two styles of games, beat em up and shooter in a unique way. The story is told like a comic book. - 3 Playable characters with different techniques and special powers - 8 Stages - 5 Bosses - Variety of enemies - Unique gameplay that mixes the shotter and the Beat 'em up - Mounts with which you can attack the enemy.
